nodes.text: The Jafan system was located in the Chommell sector, a part of the Trailing Sectors portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with King Jafan of the Chommell sector planet Naboo, as well as the starship Jafan III.
The Jafan system was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed it in grid square O-16.
